fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, consume 4 stacks of Authority to Condemn a player. They will appear suspicious (as a Tyrant) until you die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you are visited by an innocent player at night, gain a stack of Authority.
- If you are visited by a Condemned player at night, gain 2 stacks of Authority instead.
- During the day, you may expend 1 authority to gain an additional anonymous vote. You can do this up to once per day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose.
